name: Maelstrom Mayhem
description:
Description:
The elementals continue their endless war for the Maelstrom! Enter the skirmish and battle it out against other elementals. Elementals are volatile and will shapeshift into other forms randomly. This is a difficult battle, are you up for the challenge?

With art and music by the wonderful Stevie Galliart. Go check out her work.

Controls:
Move: Hold left mouse button, guide with cursor.
Attack: Click (or hold) right mouse button.

Jam Details:
This game was made in 3 days for the Ludum Dare 35 Jam in April of 2016. The theme of the jam was "Shapeshift." The game received the following rankings:

Category Rank (out of 1593 entries) Score (out of 5) Overall 6103.18Audio 3723.25Innovation 3823.25Graphics 5373.34Fun 5753.08Mood 7262.86Humor 6752.15Theme 4833.42
